name: Super Stall to Infinity Tumbling
description: Super Stall directly connected into an Infinite Tumbling. The Full Stall must not necessarily be high but shall be perfectly straight

criterias.normal: rhythm, flow, trajectory (no roll movement), tension in the lines and glider, duration, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: twisted on the entry, untwist after the stall and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling without twist
criterias.full twisted: twisted on the entry, stay twisted after the stall and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling twisted and untwist at exit (not during the turns)
criterias.devil twist: twisted on the entry, untwist during the stall and immediately twist to the other direction and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling twisted
criterias.twisted exit: stay twisted during the exit of the Infinity Tumbling
criterias.flip: the pilot performs a flip just after the glider stalled, proceed into the Infinity Tumbling

connection: Forbidden connection to Tumbling or Anti-Rhythmic SAT
